Home Workbench Journey

Systems Explorer.

I'm a developer building a map of the web, from production backends to modern, local-first PWAs. This is my digital workbench.

My curiosity has always pushed me past the "how" and into the "why." I'm driven to understand the full system, not just a single part.

This site archives that journey of exploration. It's not a gallery of "finished" products, but a ledger of experiments, "chain-reactions," and the key insights I've gathered while building with modern tools.
